decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall be discontinued, the marquees removed and the land be restored to the state as specified in the notes attached to this condition no later than the 21/03/2014 or when the use has permanently ceased, whichever is the earlier, in accordance with the approved plans and supporting information as detailed in Condition 2 below.
The temporary marquees shall only be used on the dates specified within this application::
 	Saturday 02 November 2013
 	Saturday 09 November 2013
 	Saturday 16 November 2013
 	Saturday 22 February 2014
 	Sunday 09 March 2014
The land shall be restored to the state as indicated on drawing no. AC07H_p_005 as submitted.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (AC53_p_081, AC53_p_051, AC53_p_031, AC53_p_010, AC53_p_004, AC53_p_003, AC53_p_001, AC07H_p_005, Ecology Report (R001/rev02) August 2011, Flood Risk Assessment (Issue 1) December 2011, Transport Statement (v1) December 2011, Flood Risk Assessment October 2012, Ecological Appraisal October 2012, Transport Statement (FINAL) October 2012 received 15/09/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The development permitted by this planning permission shall be carried out in accordance with the approved Flood Risk Assessment (FRA) ref 26736/001 dated Oct 2012 produced by PBA and the following mitigation measures detailed within the FRA: 
1.	Provision of open voids below marquees to allow conveyance and temporary storage of floodwater 
2.	establishment of maintenance regime to ensure the void area remains operational 
3.	Identification and provision of safe route(s) into and out of the site to an appropriate safe haven. 
4.	Finished floor levels are set no lower than 9.59m above Ordnance Datum (AOD). 

The mitigation measures shall be fully implemented prior to occupation and subsequently in accordance with the timing/phasing arrangements embodied within the scheme, or within any other period as may subsequently be agreed, in writing, by the local planning authority.
description: Temporary use of the land to the south, west and east of the existing buildings commencing on 14 October 2013 to 21 March 2014 for the erection of a corporate hospitality facility during the Autumn Internationals 2013 and Six Nations 2014 Rugby internationals
